name: Rock Fighters
description:
A simple battle game (1vs1) inspired in games like Super Smash Bros.

Features Beta 0.1

🎸2 "skins" available

🎸Music: only "welcome to the jungle" is in the game (We are working on the update  to fix this :) )

🎸1 map (Remember this is the first beta of the game, we want to make lots of maps)

🎸Joypad supported

Controls

You will need a Joypad to play(obviously a joypad that can be connected in computer)

🎸Jump:

Sony control: "X" button

Nintendo control: "B" button

Microsoft control: "A" button

🎸Punch/Fight:

Sony control: "O" button

Nintendo control: "A" button

Microsoft control: "B" button

KeyBoard no supported(yet ;) )

Characters Beta 0.1

In this first beta we did not finish all the characters (in the final version there will be 4 characters, but, no spoilers xd)

First character created was "StarChild" Inspired in StarChils from KISS

Second character created was "Brian May" inspired in Brian May from Queen

(we are thinking of which 2 more characters could we add, so if you have an idea you can leave it in the comments)

Credits

Art by: ColisionShape

Game dev and Game design: Torratu

Music: Guns n Roses
